alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 4:57PM CDT until May 28 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hansford County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 457 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Morse, or 19 miles west of Spearman, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Gruver, Morse and Texhoma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
